translations: v．使困惑，使疑惑：使某人感到困惑或不知所措。
· The complex math problem flummoxes me.
这个复杂的数学问题让我感到困惑。

sentences.sentence: A sudden boost of cortisol that flummoxes the math-anxious has the opposite effect on the non-anxious, research shows: It pushes the person into the "performance sweet spot."
sentences.translation: 皮质醇会扰乱数学焦虑，但对于不紧张的人来说，皮质醇的突然升高反而会产生相反的作用，研究显示：皮质醇升高会让一个人进入“绩效甜蜜点”。

sentences.sentence: Part of the problem is that the chip is just too intelligent - rather than a standard digital pulse it produces an analogue output that flummoxes the standard software used to test chips.
sentences.translation: 其中一个问题是芯片太“过于智能”了——与普通芯片的数字脉冲输出不同，它的输出是模拟信号，因此用于数字芯片的测试程序被它干扰了。
